name: Mecha Flight
description:
Strap into your XR-50 Skyhopper and get crackin, pilot!

Made in Tic-80, written in Fennel.

I didn't have time to add any audio, sorry!

For the bullet-hell jam: Every ten seconds the player's gun changes.

Controls:

* Arrow keys - movement

* Z - shoot gun

* X - detonate bomb
